DOC.detailed_description: Induction phase : Imatinib mesylate - start 100 mg/day increase 100 mg/day week maximum tolerable dose 400 mg/day whichever occur first . For responder absence toxicity , treatment maintain one year . Patients , discontinue imatinib mesylate 3 month lack response ( response = stable disease ) , experience progression time , relapse initial response time discontinue toxicity time , go salvage phase . Salvage phase : Nilotinib - start 200 mg/day increase 200 mg/day week maximum tolerable dose 800 mg/day whichever occur first . In absence toxicity , treatment maintain one year .
